body_html: When the checkpoint files are saved with a subset of GPUs, they can't be loaded if new GPUs are used. The error is tensorflow.python.framework.errors.NotFoundError: Tensor name "tower_name_gpu_3/fc/Variable_1" not found in checkpoint files. How to work around the strict restriction?
body_text: When the checkpoint files are saved with a subset of GPUs, they can't be loaded if new GPUs are used. The error is tensorflow.python.framework.errors.NotFoundError: Tensor name "tower_name_gpu_3/fc/Variable_1" not found in checkpoint files. How to work around the strict restriction?
body: When the checkpoint files are saved with a subset of GPUs, they can't be loaded if new GPUs are used. The error is `tensorflow.python.framework.errors.NotFoundError: Tensor name "tower_name_gpu_3/fc/Variable_1" not found in checkpoint files`. How to work around the strict restriction?
